name: Astevo
description:
Astevo is an evolution space shooter game still in development. You start with the ability to move horizontal and shooting like in Asteroid,. There are everywhere hidden missions you have to complete to unlock a new feauture.

Play the demo right here in your Browser with your Keyboard or Gamepad (suggestion XBOX 360 Controller)

There are 3 different difficult modes

  • Easy : Unlimited Lives
  • Medium: You have 3 Lives each Level
  • Hard: One hit and Game Over 

If you like the game feel free to share with your friends :D

Have fun on playing Astevo.
